name: Nohzdyve for MSX
description:
This is a MSX version for speccy game Nohzdyve written by Matt Wescott and released as an Easter Egg for Bandersnatch episode of Black Mirror.

This game I've created for scratch to answer my own question: "Can I write games (for MSX) using something like MVC architecture?"

Well, this game is my answer...

For more details and source code visit its git repository on GitHub.

Instructions

Use «LEFT» and «RIGHT» arrows from keyboard or joystick #1 to move the character over screen, catching eye balls and avoid everything else.
